names.english: four favorable ingredients heat clearing drink
names.commonEnglish: Four Favorable Ingredients Heat Clearing Drink

actions: Releases the Exterior, expels Wind-Dampness and alleviates pain.
With Qiang Huo, for Wind-Dampness.
With Qiang Huo and Dang Gui, for Wind-Cold-Damp Bi.
Clears Heat, reduces Fire, eliminates irritability, drains Damp-Heat, cools the Blood, relieves toxicity, invigorates the Blood, reduces swelling and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
With Da Huang, for constipation.
Clears Heat especially in the Upper Jiao, relieves toxicity, reduces abscesses, dissipates clumps, clears Blood Heat and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Clears Damp-Heat, cools the Blood, stops bleeding and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Drains Heat, purges accumulations, transforms Dampness, promotes urination, cools and invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, eliminates Phlegm and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, relieves pain, clears Heat, cools the Blood, reduces swelling from sores and abscesses and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
With Jin Yin Hua, reduces obstruction and toxicity for swollen, painful sores and necrosis of surrounding tissue.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity, vents and disperses External Wind-Heat and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
With Lian Qiao, for various Heat disorders.
Clears Lung Heat, transforms Hot Phlegm, regulates Qi (unbinds the chest), reduces abscesses, dissipates nodules and eliminates pus.
Clears Lung Heat, promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
Clears Heat and relieves Fire toxicity, inhibits the growth of cancer cells, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels
Releases the Exterior
Expels Wind-Dampness
Alleviates pain
Clears Lung Heat
Clears Damp-Heat
Cools the Blood
Resolves Fire toxicity
